attributes.action: Protect internet freedom from corporate takeovers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the US congress has given the 4 major players the ability to make the internet into a private network which will result in high charges in a queued system and probably eventually censorship. We call on this government to protect our rights of free speech and to resist any imposition of the US corporation's desires to own and control the internet for their own monetary and political gains.
